title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: In a large bowl, combine butter, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract. Stir very well.
In a medium bowl, combine flour, cornstarch, baking soda, and salt.
Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients. Mix very well, then add the chocolate chips.
Chill dough in refrigerator for 30 minutes.
On parchment-lined cookie pans, scoop dough into 1.5 T blobs, about 5 cm apart.
Bake for 11 minutes, then remove to cool and continue solidifying for another 10.
